channel.title: Client NPC Store Error, Please Help
channel.description:
Client/Source: Teamtorva v3
Hello everyone, i would like to ask for some help for this issue, what the problem is
in my server, when i want to purchase a skill cape (any) at the wise old man , my client freezes when i click on him to purchase with money in my inventory, but if i click on him with no money in my inventory it works, but i cant buy the cape because i have no money, the error it gives me when i do buy something with money in my inventory is:
Exception in thread "Threas-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 32895
at ItemDef.forID<ItemDef.java:12> at ItemDef.getSprite<ItemDef.java:637> at client.drawInterface<client.java:9836> at client.draw3dScreen<client.java:10532> at client.method146<client.java:14464> at client.drawGameScreen<client.java9627> at client.processDrawing<client.java:10465> at RSApplet.run<RSApplet.java:108> at client.run<client.java:6027> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unkown Source>
I would really appreciate the help, thank you!

item.title: Client NPC Store Error, Please Help
item.dc:creator: @God_Father God Father
item.description:
@God_Father wrote:

Client/Source: Teamtorva v3

Hello everyone, i would like to ask for some help for this issue, what the problem is

in my server, when i want to purchase a skill cape (any) at the wise old man , my client freezes when i click on him to purchase with money in my inventory, but if i click on him with no money in my inventory it works, but i cant buy the cape because i have no money, the error it gives me when i do buy something with money in my inventory is:

Exception in thread “Threas-5” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 32895

at ItemDef.forIDItemDef.java:12
at ItemDef.getSpriteItemDef.java:637
at client.drawInterfaceclient.java:9836
at client.draw3dScreenclient.java:10532
at client.method146client.java:14464
at client.drawGameScreen<client.java9627>
at client.processDrawingclient.java:10465
at RSApplet.runRSApplet.java:108
at client.runclient.java:6027
at java.lang.Thread.run

I would really appreciate the help, thank you!
